Posts.Content: Jan 29, 2012 11:53PM lissette4801 wrote: hello k listen as long as we could breathe we will flow until god allow us to swim again i just had my mastectomy on jan 9th a lot of time is always good to always go out and do something fun with your kids and hubby a day before you go to any dr appt..pls stay positive and try not to stress yourself we didnt ask for this but is here AND WE GOING TO KICK HIS BUD and send it back where it came from i know is hard because every day i think BOUT MY KIDS nd that is what keeps me fighting,, put you pink gloves on girl i am in your corner  got your back !! positive <<smile  and let god do the rest
Posts.Title: Diagnosed and scared kfontaine bluepearl
